definition[0]: the person who uses a particular product, rather than the people who make or develop it
definition[1]: the person who actually uses a particular product or service, rather than someone involved in its production or sale
example[0]: End users used to get very little say in what software they got.
example[1]: The company is examining the feasibility of retail outlets or catalogues, instead of selling direct to the end-user as in the past.
